name: echo
description: /echo <message> repeats <message> back to thread

name: weather
description: view weather information

name: color

usage.random: changes thread color to a random color
usage.++: makes the current thread color lighter
usage.--: makes the current thread color darker
usage.<hex>: changes color of current thread to <hex>

description: change the color of a thread

name: nickname
description: Allows for various nickname actions

name: title
description: /title <title> sets the <title> of current thread

name: figlet
description: /figlet <message> replies with a figlet of <message>

name: preferences
description: sets one of the default preferences for this thread. use prefs list to show possible preferences.

name: emoji
description: /emoji <emoji name> sets the channel emoji to the name of the emoji specified

name: cowsay
description: /cowsay <message> replies with a cowsay of <message>

name: poll

usage.create <question>: Creates a poll with title <question> if a poll does not exist already
usage.add <option>: Adds an <option> to an existing poll
usage.delete <option>: Deletes an <option> in an existing poll
usage.view: Prints the poll with vote counts

description: Create a poll, and add options for users to vote on

name: help
description: /help shows sadbot usage and descriptions

name: vote
description: /vote <option #> votes for a poll option

name: xkcd

usage.[] OR today: get the most recent XKCD comic

description: get a XCKD comic

name: ping
description: /ping <name> sends a PM to a user to get their attention

name: plusplus
description: /++ <username> will give a user one karma point

name: minusminus
description: /-- <username> will remove one karma point from a user

name: karma
description: check a user's karma

name: pokedex

usage.move <move-name>: displays information about a pokemon move

description: see information about a pokemon or move

name: stocks
description: /stocks <stock-symbol> see information on stock price of specified <stock-symbol>

name: aesthetic
description: /aesthetic <text> gives your <text> some much needed ａｅｓｔｈｅｔｉｃ

name: 8ball
description: /8ball <text> gives you some insight about your query

name: yelp
description: /yelp <business> gets a <business> in San Francisco

name: tv
description: /tv <show> returns information about the show or next episode if still running.
